channel.title: Goals-habits on Colin Spear

item.title: Identity goals
item.description: Identity goals This is inspired by Atomic Habits. I wrote them when I read the book then forgot about them for some time. After a while I returned to reread them and found it to be a useful recentering device. So I’m keeping them for now. Goals: I want to be the type of person who is competent at statistics, machine learning, causal inference and software engineering I don’t drink more often than I do drink.
